Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi510959897","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgyMWRkZDctZDdkNi00OWQ1LTg3NTMtNTY1NDk5MTAwMTM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgyMWRkZDctZDdkNi00OWQ1LTg3NTMtNTY1NDk5MTAwMTM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Sanctuary: Season Four","datePublished":"2008-10-03","description":"Stem cells, gene therapy, transplants, and cloning have changed the definition of "humanity" in the modern world, but the darker side contains monsters that only few are brave enough to face, because the future lies in their hands.","keywords":"2000s,2010s,paranormal phenomena,psychotronic series,evolution","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0965394/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"umar_n12","dateCreated":"2008-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Getting pretty good!","reviewBody":"This is a review of the first season on TV, which should really be known as season 1 on IMDb, and the webisodes season 0.

Essentially there are three main characters, all of which believable, even Tapping's accent, and I'm saying that as a Brit. She's great as Magnus, not overdone, but sensitive, slightly badass and played right. She has a daughter, Ashley. She's instantly likable and Emelie Ullerup doesn't fall into the trap of making her the typical blond 'Yeah, uhuh I like totally, like, kick- ass. Isn't that cool!' character. Instead she's much better and thankfully without a teenage crisis. I'll get onto Robin Dunne's excellent Will in a sec.

Sanctuary is more than just the sum of its parts. It has a great grittiness to it, a real world, almost familiar environment. It's slightly dark, but optimistic at the same part. 30 minutes into the pilot and I really liked it. Will was believable, I even liked and sympathised with him. the way it was done felt like a feature, not really like an hour long weekly show. The whole actual Sanctuary concept wasn't done too fantastically. However I felt it wasn't perfect but it's taken me 2 more episodes to think that actually it's worth continuing to watch.

For Brits, its on ITV 4, mondays at 9. Or 8. Pretty sure it's 9, but check. if you don't have ITV 4, it's on their catch up thing on the site. For Americans it's on Hulu and Sci Fi's Rewind.

Have fun getting into it, looking forward to see where it goes.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19555,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Martin Wood, Steven A. Adelson, Brenton Spencer, Peter DeLuise, Lee Wilson
Category: Action|Drama|Fantasy|Action|Drama|Fantasy|Mystery|Sci-Fi

Librarian-turned-adventurer Flynn Carsen endeavors to find King Solomon's mines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455596/","name":"The Librarian: Return to King Solomon's Mines","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxNzc4NzYyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDYwMTc0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001864/","name":"Noah Wyle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000270/","name":"Gabrielle Anwar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0627878/","name":"Bob Newhart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000408/","name":"Jonathan Frakes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009512/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003899/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0236787/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0773605/","name":"Marco Schnabel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0864435/","name":"David N. Titcher"}],"datePublished":"2006-12-03","description":"Librarian-turned-adventurer Flynn Carsen endeavors to find King Solomon's mines.","keywords":"reference to peter pan,mine,king solomon,skull,scroll","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455596/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"deejou"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Silly, but a lot of fun","reviewBody":"If you don't take it too seriously you'll really enjoy this. Noah Wyle returns as the Librarian Flynn. This time he sets out to find King Solomon's Mine together with the help of fellow "nerd" Emily Davenport (Gabrielle Anwar). I found a lot of similarities to Indiana Jones as well as The Mummy is this film. But it did not ruin the Librarian 2 for me at all. It's still different enough to stand alone. I think the character Flynn makes this movie. He is an interesting and well written character who really entertains. I also enjoyed the addition of Gabrielle Anwar, whose love/hate relationship with Flynn creates some nice laughs. Overall The Librarian 2 has enough action, adventure and twists to keep you interested. Basically if you liked the first one, you'll like this one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13654,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

Sztuczki
programme.desc: Directed by Andrzej Jakimowski. With Damian Ul, Ewelina Walendziak, Tomasz Sapryk, Rafal Guzniczak. Six-year-old Stefek challenges fate. He believes that setting a chain of events in motion will help him get closer to his father who left his mother. His sister helps him bribe fate with small sacrifices. Tricks and coincidences bring his father back but things go wrong and Stefek tries a very risky trick...

Soon this newfound family realizes that, in a world in which the adults in power have betrayed them, running is not enough and they must wage a resistance, using their collective power to take back control of their future."},"datePublished":"2018-08-03","description":"Imprisoned by an adult world that now fears everyone under 18, a group of teens form a resistance group to fight back and reclaim control of their future.","keywords":"supernatural power,super power,super powers,telekinesis,mind control","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4073790/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"icechips-185-14175"},"dateCreated":"2018-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really enjoyed the movie","reviewBody":"Saw some low ratings & wondered why. The interaction between Ruby, Liam, Chubb & Zu was great, but I did wonder why Zu didn't speak (I missed the 1st 5 minutes, so maybe it was in there why). The 'world' was different. I even cried at the end. "},"datePublished":"2020-02-27","description":"When Cecilia's abusive ex takes his own life and leaves her his fortune, she suspects his death was a hoax. As a series of coincidences turn lethal, Cecilia works to prove that she is being hunted by someone nobody can see.","keywords":"domestic abuse,psychological abuse,throat slitting,invisibility,mad scientist","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1051906/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BlueSkies765"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best movie of 2020 so far","reviewBody":"With the pandemic I think studios released the movies they were not in love with and are still holding on to their best movies for later this year or the beginning of next year. There was an abundance to stream but The Invisible Man was one of the few movies I thought was actually good.\n\nElisabeth Moss had an excellent performance. Really making me feel the horror of the situations she was in. The concept was nice. It was executed well with some terrifying scenes. Not just seeing the horror but making you imagine the horror. There were some by the book scenes but the creators also did create some memorable unique scenes. Worth the watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":185173,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Koko-di koko-da
Koko-di Koko-da
programme.desc: Koko-di koko-da: Directed by Johannes Nyholm. With Leif Edlund, Peter Belli, Helle Andersen, Stine Bruun. As a couple goes on a trip to find their way back to each other, a sideshow artist and his shady entourage emerge from the woods, terrorizing them, luring them deeper into a maelstrom of psychological terror and humiliating slapstick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9355200/","name":"Koko-di koko-da","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ3NWIwNGEtOWM3Zi00MDg4LWFmMTItZjFhM2Q2M2NhZWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3011554/","name":"Leif Edlund"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068959/","name":"Peter Belli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12297161/","name":"Helle Andersen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3132183/","name":"Johannes Nyholm"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0188901/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001935/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3132183/","name":"Johannes Nyholm"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi850247193","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQ3NGFkYjAtNTIyMC00YjA2LWI5MmEtMjQ1M2U2ODRlNzFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQ3NGFkYjAtNTIyMC00YjA2LWI5MmEtMjQ1M2U2ODRlNzFlXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Elin and Tobias are a happily married couple who regularly vacation with their young daughter. The family is on a dreamy holiday when an innocuous case of food poisoning derails their plans and forever alters the course of their lives. Three years later, the once loving couple is on the road again to go camping, looking for one last chance to go back to the way things used to be. But what once was is lost, and our characters instead find themselves having to relive the same nightmarish events, as that day and the horrors it brings repeat themselves infinitely. Together, they must overcome their trauma, reconcile with their past and fight for their lives. Over, and over, and over again."},"datePublished":"2019-08-23","description":"As a couple goes on a trip to find their way back to each other, a sideshow artist and his shady entourage emerge from the woods, terrorizing them, luring them deeper into a maelstrom of psychological terror and humiliating slapstick","keywords":"camping,husband wife relationship,forest,time loop,couple","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9355200/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Horror_Flick_Fanatic"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Do not pee in the swedish woods","reviewBody":"This is an odd-ball film. I am not sure if the moral is to not let your wife pee alone in the woods or f__k the b___h and save your own hide.\n\nBut strangely i did enjoy the watch. Perhaps the film is too brainy for me and I should search out a film analysis on Youtube.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1993,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

The story itself is nothing new but has deeply disturbing sexual connotations with man-milk emmanating from the wall power sockets/holes and wall switches that look like the female orifice as well as pulsating holes in walls and the old silicone wall effect akin to body horror greats like David Lynch and it does on the budget accomplish a rather gruesome and warped horror.\n\nActing is average and the story is very average having been done many times before but the sexual perversion and accompanying gooey special effects really will have you squirming, it has some quite shocking hammer-tastic female revenge action which definitely pushes this out of the bargain basement bin. Its not great but its not bad either but most assuredly it is quite disturbing so gets a fair average 5/10 from me!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8457,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kokon
Kokon
programme.desc: Kokon: Directed by Leonie Krippendorff. With Lena Urzendowsky, Jella Haase, Lena Klenke, Elina Vildanova. Berlin-Kreuzberg is Nora's microcosm. Nora, the silent observer, is always tagging along: At parties, at school, at the pool, on rooftops and in apartments. Nora drifts around the monotonous housing blocks with her big sister and her friends, witnessing events that seem to cross-fade in the summer light. Girls who want to be slim and pretty, boys who say dumb things to provoke or because they are in love. Ruthless smartphone cameras and fragile teenagers. But Nora has her own way of looking at the world, and when she meets Romy, she realizes why. There is music in the air, Nora's body is changing, and caterpillars are spinning their cocoons. Realistic and taking on the protagonist's perspective, this film captures a summer of change." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10107222/","name":"Kokon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkMTYxNjctNjIyZS00NDdhLThmZDUtZTAzMDhhMzk0ZGFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjAwMTE0OTk@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6584167/","name":"Lena Urzendowsky"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3436464/","name":"Jella Haase"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3609745/","name":"Lena Klenke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5111029/","name":"Leonie Krippendorff"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020065/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222794/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0580746/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5111029/","name":"Leonie Krippendorff"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1118420505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjc3YTMzMGMtNjA1MC00YzA4LWJkMmMtY2ZkODlkMzNiODdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjc3YTMzMGMtNjA1MC00YzA4LWJkMmMtY2ZkODlkMzNiODdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"datePublished":"2020-02-21","description":"Berlin-Kreuzberg is Nora's microcosm. Nora, the silent observer, is always tagging along: At parties, at school, at the pool, on rooftops and in apartments. Nora drifts around the monotonous housing blocks with her big sister and her","keywords":"lesbian interest,lesbian kiss,lesbian romance,jealousy","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10107222/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ops-52535"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"an expressionistic view...","reviewBody":"On a young teenage girl developing from the egg and catterpillar stage, then transform into a hard shell pupae of grief, till she wakes up and spreading her wings of beauty and opportunity in a life-tranformation called puberty. Its a film about angst, gender identity, sex, nudity ,fumbling , experimenting, drugs, alcohol and most of all which is the sadest part, a mothers neglect of her children. Its summer hot berlin im sommer urlaub, its urban life in urban apartments with strikingly realistic urban children, in a film thats made in such european/german style that ill bet youll never find such a plot in american moviemaking. There are some flaws and floskls here and there, but the director has been able to make a film that makes your butterfly tingle in your guts, even in an old and grumpy man as me, therefore a little recommend on this one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":570,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wiki
programme.desc: Autystyczna Wiki (Kamila Kobic) jest ciekawa świata. Musi zmierzyć się z trudną rzeczywistością. Pewnego dnia spotyka Mateusza (Adam Bobik), fana autobusów warszawskiej komunikacji miejskiej, który wprowadza radość do jej szarego życia.

credits.actor: Kamila Kobic
Magdalena Kizinkiewicz
Adam Bobik

programme.title: 60 kilo niczego
programme.desc: Zimny poranek w odkrywkowej kopalni kruszców. Krzysztof (Grzegorz Damięcki) zaczyna pierwszy dzień pracy na stanowisku kierownika. Wyraźnie nie pasuje on do środowiska pracowników fizycznych. W trosce o własną pozycję, zamierza trzymać dyscyplinę twardą ręką. Nagły wypadek, którego ofiarą staje się jeden z ukraińskich robotników, wystawia zasady moralne Krzysztofa na próbę. Zdaje on sobie sprawę z tego, że łatwo być stanowczym tylko w sprzyjających okolicznościach. Jednak trudno mu przeciwstawić się złu, kiedy w grę wchodzą dramatyczne konsekwencje.

credits.actor: Grzegorz Damięcki
Artem Manuilov
Andrzej Grabowski

programme.title: Spitsbergen
programme.desc: Magda (Magdalena Czerwińska), zawieszona ratowniczka medyczna, otrzymuje nagłe wezwanie. Oznacza to dla niej powrót do dramatycznych wydarzeń i ludzkich tragedii. Gdy opada poziom adrenaliny, kobieta przypomina sobie podróże na Spitsbergen - mroźną norweską wyspę na Morzu Arktycznym. To miejsce stało się dla niej powodem traumy, z którą do tej pory nie zdołała się uporać. Przerastają ją cudze nieszczęścia i własna przeszłość.

credits.actor: Magdalena Czerwińska
Marek Kossakowski
Marian Dziędziel

programme.title: Acid Rain
programme.desc: Młoda ucieka z domu jak najdalej od smutnej, bezbarwnej miejscowości. Szybko okazuje się, że podróż autostopem nie jest tak ekscytująca, jak się wydawało, kiedy znajduje się w środku nocy na obrzeżach postkomunistycznego miasta. Dziewczyna dostrzega na moście postać, która niebezpiecznie balansuje na barierce. Tak poznaje niezrównoważonego dziwaka Chudego. Oboje postanawiają na jakiś czas obrać taki sam kierunek podróży. Pod osłoną nocy snują się po mieście, w coraz dziwniejsze rejony, doświadczając niezwykłych emocji. Wkrótce między Młodą a Chudym tworzy się nienazwana więź. Całość oparta jest na płaszczyźnie psychodelicznej jak z narkotycznego transu.

programme.title: Ukojenie
programme.desc: 52-letnia Taina (Tiina Pirhonen) przygotowuje się na idealny weekend z rodziną, ponieważ jej syn Eetu (Paavo Kinnunen) odwiedza ją ze swoją dziewczyną. Spotkanie nie przebiega jednak zgodnie z planem. Im bardziej samotna kobieta próbuje rozbawić bliskich, tym mniej komfortowo się oni czują.

credits.actor: Tiina Pirhonen
Eero Saarinen
Paavo Kinnunen

aguardaba su jubilación con algo de entusiasmo cuando un ladrón de cuadros captó su atención.","keywords":"female nudity,topless female nudity,female full rear nudity,barefoot woman,sex scene","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7458798/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dbdumonteil"},"dateCreated":"2019-11-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tu parles, Charles!","reviewBody":"First effort by Lucas Bernard ,both director and screenwriter;his work as a writer leaves a lot to be desired : his story is complicated instead of complex, full of plot holes ,and it's really difficult to pigeonhole the movie: a detective story? rehersals for retirement?(isn't it a bit ironical for a first work?)A (bland) love story?a depiction of social customs of contemporary times?A gibe at modern art ?A tribute to Arsene Lupin and to Louis Feuillade 's Musidora of the silent era?

It does not make a good movie for all that .In the first part ,every scene seems to be the beginning of the film ,and the cop's investigation ,apart from some good lines such as: "the robberies in museums are risky :try to flog "Mona lisa!";so robbery in the wealthy parvenus's houses is a better job.

Fortunately , there are actors who can save something from the wreckage :an actor who works on stage as well as in the movies ,Charles Berling is one of them ;without him ,I would have yawned my head off all along this bore .In my book,everything rests on his shoulders : wearing a wry smile, often overtaken by events (like the cops in old Arsene Lupin), ill at ease in those galleries of weirdoes (the "invitation") or nouveaux riches (our hero does not have a clue in art),he walks through the film like a tourist , rehearsing for retirement .Too subtle a thespian for the part , he nonetheless succeeds in making us feel his fear of retiring (his "I 'll take care of my grandchildren" does not convince anybody ,even himself ): for that matter ,the very old grandad "they don't know to do with "is an ominous prospect .

He may envy the "beau Voyou" (beautiful lout),his youth and his attractive girlfriend ,but he had the last laugh (the very last picture)."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":260,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

Fortunately , there are actors who can save something from the wreckage :an actor who works on stage as well as in the movies ,Charles Berling is one of them ;without him ,I would have yawned my head off all along this bore .In my book,everything rests on his shoulders : wearing a wry smile, often overtaken by events (like the cops in old Arsene Lupin), ill at ease in those galleries of weirdoes (the "invitation") or nouveaux riches (our hero does not have a clue in art),he walks through the film like a tourist , rehearsing for retirement .Too subtle a thespian for the part , he nonetheless succeeds in making us feel his fear of retiring (his "I 'll take care of my grandchildren" does not convince anybody ,even himself ): for that matter ,the very old grandad "they don't know to do with "is an ominous prospect .

He may envy the "beau Voyou" (beautiful lout),his youth and his attractive girlfriend ,but he had the last laugh (the very last picture).","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":260,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"duration":"PT1H44M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Lucas Bernard

programme.title: The Big Sick
I tak Cię kocham
programme.desc: The Big Sick: Directed by Michael Showalter. With Kumail Nanjiani, Zoe Kazan, Holly Hunter, Ray Romano. Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's expectations, and his true feelings." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5462602/","name":"The Big Sick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWM4YzZjOTEtZmU5ZS00ZTRkLWFiNjAtZTEwNzIzMDM5MjdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDg2MjUxNjM@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3529685/","name":"Kumail Nanjiani"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1443740/","name":"Zoe Kazan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000456/","name":"Holly Hunter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795290/","name":"Michael Showalter"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0073081/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251858/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0462648/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5077137/","name":"Emily V. Gordon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3529685/","name":"Kumail Nanjiani"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3014637849","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjdjN2ZlNjktZGNmZi00NjY5LTgzZDYtNjRmYjFhODcwZThlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU4NjY5MzM@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjdjN2ZlNjktZGNmZi00NjY5LTgzZDYtNjRmYjFhODcwZThlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU4NjY5MzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple deals with their cultural differences as their relationship grows."},"datePublished":"2017-07-14","description":"Pakistan-born comedian Kumail Nanjiani and grad student Emily Gardner fall in love but struggle as their cultures clash. When Emily contracts a mysterious illness, Kumail finds himself forced to face her feisty parents, his family's ","keywords":"interracial love,arranged marriage,stand up comedy,illness,family relationships","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5462602/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Anurag-Shetty"},"dateCreated":"2017-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hilarious & poignant, at the same time.","reviewBody":"The Big Sick tells the true story of Kumail(Kumail Nanjiani). Kumail is an amateur stand-up comedian. He meets & falls in love with Emily(Zoe Kazan). Kumail & Emily become a couple. Now they have to decide whether their relationship has a future, due to the massive difference in their cultures. This makes things between Kumail & Emily, complicated. \n\nThe Big Sick is a fantastic movie. What is fascinating about this film is that, it's based on the real life love story of Kumail(who also wrote the film) & co-writer of the script, Emily V. Gordon. Director Michael Showalter has done a bang-up job, balancing the romantic, comedic & dramatic elements of the movie. This film is laugh-out- loud funny but, it can also make you feel emotional, from time to time. The performances are spot on. Kumail Nanjiani is brilliant as Kumail. Zoe Kazan is spectacular as Emily. Nanjiani & Kazan share an adorable & effortless chemistry, in all their scenes together. Holly Hunter is outstanding as Beth. Ray Romano is awesome as Terry. Anupam Kher is superb as Azmat. Zenobia Shroff is great as Sharmeen. Adeel Akhtar is excellent as Naveed. Bo Burnham, Aidy Bryant, Kurt Braunohler & Shenaz Treasurywala are impressive as CJ, Mary, Chris & Fatima, respectively. The Big Sick is a must watch for romantic comedy fans. Go for it, as soon as you can.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":124673,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ale krótkie: Próba charakteru
programme.desc: Cykl prezentujący wyselekcjonowany zbiór najlepszych filmów krótkometrażowych. Wiele z nich nagrodzonych zostało prestiżowymi wyróżnieniami na międzynarodowych galach i festiwalach filmowych. Każde pasmo przedstawia kilka produkcji na dany temat.

programme.title: Tamtej nocy
programme.desc: Zuzanna Szwarc (Hanna Konarowska), mama kilkuletniej dziewczynki, pracuje jako kuratorka sztuki. Pewnego wieczoru widzi napad. Dwóch mężczyzna atakuje chłopaka. Zuza nie pozostaje obojętna i stara się go obronić. Kiedy na miejsce przybywa policja, to jednak ona, nie sprawcy pobicia, zostaje aresztowana.

credits.actor: Hanna Konarowska
Piotr Stramowski
Karina Kunkiewicz

programme.title: Wiki
programme.desc: Autystyczna Wiki (Kamila Kobic) jest ciekawa świata. Musi zmierzyć się z trudną rzeczywistością. Pewnego dnia spotyka Mateusza (Adam Bobik), fana autobusów warszawskiej komunikacji miejskiej, który wprowadza radość do jej szarego życia.

credits.actor: Kamila Kobic
Magdalena Kizinkiewicz
Adam Bobik

programme.title: Owoce chmur
programme.desc: Mroczny las. W norach mieszkają przypominające misie koala zwierzątka, które wypatrują pomarańczowych nasion. Są nimi spadające z nieba owoców chmur. Pewnego dnia jedno ze stworzonek zapuszcza się w gęstwinę, gdzie czeka na nie wielka niespodzianka. Obraz stanowi pracę dyplomową Kateřiny Karhánkovej z Wydziału Animacji praskiej FAMU, reżyserki i scenarzystki, która znana jest z autorskich filmów dla dzieci - "Zarazek Tonda" oraz "Nowy gatunek".

programme.title: Sole
Sole
programme.desc: Sole: Directed by Carlo Sironi. With Claudio Segaluscio, Sandra Drzymalska, Bruno Buzzi, Marco Felli. Lena is seven months pregnant and she's ready to sell the baby in her belly. Ermanno agrees to pretend to be the father. Fabio, the uncle of Ermanno, will pay them to buy the child that he and his wife Bianca cannot have. A fake adoption between relatives, a loophole to bypass the law cause in Italy the surrogate motherhood is forbidden. A world in which money is the only standard of value, the only thing that matter. Ermanno and Lena are two strangers that must pretend in public to be a couple and live together until the delivery. They are used to only think about themselves and they fight all the time. Fabio, the uncle of Ermanno, will pay them to buy the child that he and his wife Bianca cannot have. A fake adoption between relatives, a loophole to bypass the law cause in Italy the surrogate motherhood is forbidden. A world in which money is the only standard of value, the only thing that matter. Ermanno and Lena are two strangers that must pretend in public to be a couple and live together until the delivery. They are used to only think about themselves and they fight all the time. But living side by side they start becoming what they were only pretending to be." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9648994/","name":"Sole","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYwMjI2YjUtMzAyOS00YWViLWJiY2UtYzcwZTliYjk5YTRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzMxMDgxNjc@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10421676/","name":"Claudio Segaluscio","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8272878/","name":"Sandra Drzymalska","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125644/","name":"Bruno Buzzi"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0802910/","name":"Carlo Sironi"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0398661/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0349562/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2664958/","name":"Antonio Manca","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3752255/","name":"Giulia Moriggi","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0802910/","name":"Carlo Sironi"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2633482009","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYzYjlkN2UtODFlNy00Yjg3LTgyYzItYjlhMTMzMTY5YzQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYzYjlkN2UtODFlNy00Yjg3LTgyYzItYjlhMTMzMTY5YzQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","datePublished":"2019-10-24","description":"Lena is seven months pregnant and she's ready to sell the baby in her belly. programme.title: Wbić flagę
programme.desc: W ramach przygotowań do lądowania na Księżycu NASA wysyła zespół astronautów do Islandii, gdzie panują warunki zbliżone do tych, jakie obserwuje się na ziemskim satelicie. Podczas pobytu na wyspie odkrywają oni, jakie przeszkody może przynieść ze sobą kosmiczna misja. Szczególnym wyzwanie okazuje się konfrontacja z miejscowym hodowcą owiec.

programme.title: Planta permanente
Kafeteria
programme.desc:
Planta permanente: Directed by Ezequiel Radusky. With Liliana Juárez, Rosario Bléfari, Verónica Perrotta, Nina Vera Suárez Bléfari. Lila and Marcela have always worked on the cleaning staff of a state office. They know its nooks and crannies better than anyone, and have found a way to support themselves - and a dream - running a clandestine kitchen in an abandoned corner of the building. But times change: a new director arrives, spouting cynical speeches full of clichés with a fistful of empty promises. The kitchen is closed and a wave of redundancies disrupts the precarious equilibrium in the office, making everyday tasks a struggle for survival." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11306358/","name":"Planta permanente","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjE2ZDkyZjItYWIwMC00YmE0LTlmZTgtYWNiMWQ5ZGZhNTE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDUwMDg1ODU@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4989891/","name":"Liliana Juárez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088164/","name":"Rosario Bléfari"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1213740/","name":"Verónica Perrotta"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4991308/","name":"Ezequiel Radusky"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250991/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0202630/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1195308/","name":"Diego Lerman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4991308/","name":"Ezequiel Radusky"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tráiler [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2604449817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWFhMjY5MTYtNDUwMC00Y2U1LWEzYmMtZjA4ZTc0MDIyNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWFhMjY5MTYtNDUwMC00Y2U1LWEzYmMtZjA4ZTc0MDIyNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"datePublished":"2019-11-15","description":"Lila and Marcela have always worked on the cleaning staff of a state office. They know its nooks and crannies better than anyone, and have found a way to support themselves - and a dream - running a clandestine kitchen in an abandone","keywords":"work","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11306358/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danybur"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"A film that presents us with the centrality of work and its impact on ties","reviewBody":"Lila and Marcela (Liliana Juárez and Rosario Bléfari, in her last film role) are old friends and have been working for years as cleaning personnel in a provincial Public Works Department. Also a long time ago and as I searched, both run a dining room in an unoccupied sector of the building to which most of the employees willingly attend. The arrival of a new Director (Verónica Perrota), who recalls the speech and the ways of a recent and prominent governor, calls into question the job security of the staff and the continuity of the dining room.

What is disturbing about this film by Ezequiel Radusky is the chronicle of how the variation of the status quo takes the unexpected path of undermining the relationship of both friends and partners. On the other hand, the movements of Lila (a true entrepreneur) to preserve or reconvert her irregular "undertaking" against all odds are moving. Impossible not to love her after the remarkable performance of Liliana Juárez, winner of the award for best actress for this role at the last Mar del Plata Film Festival.

The harshness of some situations are resolved with the best resource: humor, in an arduous film in several senses.

In short, a film that presents us with the centrality of work (in situations that are not exclusive to public employment) and its impact on ties and to what extent individual resistance to power and adverse changes is a possible path or a trap.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":126,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT1H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wolne pokoje
programme.desc: Historia Zosi (Weronika Wachowska), która pod przymusem matki przyjeżdża na wakacje do starego, rodzinnego młyna, gdzie ma się nią opiekować ciotka Krysia (Olga Miłaszewska). Krewna jest dla dziewczynki niemiła, a okolica wydaje jej się przerażająca. Pewnego dnia przyjezdna wraz z nowym kolegą odkrywa tajemnicze drzwi, które są zamknięte od lat i pod żadnym pozorem nie wolno ich otwierać. Dzieci postanawiają złamać zasadę i sprawdzić, co się za nimi kryje. Obraz nakręcono w Barlinku.

credits.actor: Weronika Wachowska
Olga Miłaszewska
Filip Zalega

programme.title: Class Action
Precedensowa sprawa
programme.desc: Class Action: Directed by Michael Apted. With Gene Hackman, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Colin Friels, Joanna Merlin. An attorney representing a traumatized accident victim finds that his opponent is a very familiar defense attorney - his own daughter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0101590/","name":"Class Action","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWY5Mjk4ZmItMTAzYS00NWE3LWEzYzYtNDgzY2MwMzA3MDIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000432/","name":"Gene Hackman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001512/","name":"Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0295506/","name":"Colin Friels"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000776/","name":"Michael Apted"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0790960/","name":"Carolyn Shelby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0024686/","name":"Christopher Ames"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0787154/","name":"Samantha Shad"}],"datePublished":"1991-03-15","description":"An attorney representing a traumatized accident victim finds that his opponent is a very familiar defense attorney - his own daughter.","keywords":"judicial,judiciary,judicial system,foxvideo,man uses a wheelchair","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0101590/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stuprince"},"dateCreated":"2003-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth a watch, but too slow","reviewBody":"The idea, great. the actors, terrific. The plot, solid. the outcome, OK at best. Class Action has its moments, but spends way too much time developing the father-daughter relationship. Just as you get into the dirty dealings of the law firm, the director and editors give us more forced relationship. This is worth a look, but only if on TV."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6969,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
Revenge: Directed by Tony Scott. With Kevin Costner, Anthony Quinn, Madeleine Stowe, Tomas Milian. A retired US Navy pilot comes to Mexico, where he falls in love with the wife of a powerful businessman. The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100485/","name":"Revenge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjIyMjc3YWUtY2M0OS00ZGIxLTkxZTItYzAyODkyMWVmZDBlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQzNDI3NzY@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000126/","name":"Kevin Costner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000063/","name":"Anthony Quinn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000656/","name":"Madeleine Stowe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001716/","name":"Tony Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064409/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059451/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0365659/","name":"Jim Harrison"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0279971/","name":"Jeffrey Alan Fiskin"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Revenge","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1805582617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjE4NTI5OTUtODVhOS00NjAyLWFlNTctZmFlZjg0OTg0ODQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjE4NTI5OTUtODVhOS00NjAyLWFlNTctZmFlZjg0OTg0ODQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"datePublished":"1990-02-16","description":"A retired US Navy pilot comes to Mexico, where he falls in love with the wife of a powerful businessman. The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen.","keywords":"betrayal,mexico,adulterous wife,extramarital affair,sex in bed","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100485/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Nazi_Fighter_David"},"dateCreated":"2003-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"'Revenge' surpassed by the flavor of desire and love...","reviewBody":"'Revenge' has a recently retired fighter pilot (Kevin Costner) who goes to the coastal city of Puerto Vallarta, to enjoy the hospitality of an old friend he saves once his life on a hunting trip... 

The possessive longtime friend has a wonderful-but-unhappy wife... Mireya (Madeleine Stowe) is an exotic young brunette, with great magnetism, who truly blew Costner's mind... Mireya embarks on a passionate affair, that naturally drives her husband 'Tibby' (Anthony Quinn) out of his mind...

Sexual tension is an integral part of Tony Scott's character's conflict... It rises off like heat emanating from the sand when the two lovers head in a jeep toward a nearby cute cabin... Costner and Stowe are attracted to one another, and naturally, the more they fight the attraction, the more they are thrown together...

Stowe's body comes alive at that brief caress, quickening her pulse, making her breath catch in anticipation... She experiences the heat in the slow slide of Costner's fingers, a passionate demand she couldn't help but respond to...

The plot is really predictable, and there's real high tension in the first part, but multiple stabbings, shootings, and beatings in the second, as the husband enters a storm of insane fury against the lovers...

'Revenge' is certainly a realm of brutality and pain, of love gone wrong and vengeance gone mad...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17192,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100485/","name":"Revenge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjIyMjc3YWUtY2M0OS00ZGIxLTkxZTItYzAyODkyMWVmZDBlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQzNDI3NzY@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000126/","name":"Kevin Costner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000063/","name":"Anthony Quinn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000656/","name":"Madeleine Stowe"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001716/","name":"Tony Scott"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064409/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059451/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0365659/","name":"Jim Harrison","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0279971/","name":"Jeffrey Alan Fiskin"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Revenge","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1805582617","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjE4NTI5OTUtODVhOS00NjAyLWFlNTctZmFlZjg0OTg0ODQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjE4NTI5OTUtODVhOS00NjAyLWFlNTctZmFlZjg0OTg0ODQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures","datePublished":"1990-02-16","description":"A retired US Navy pilot comes to Mexico, where he falls in love with the wife of a powerful businessman. The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen.","keywords":"betrayal,mexico,adulterous wife,extramarital affair,sex in bed","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100485/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Nazi_Fighter_David","dateCreated":"2003-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"'Revenge' surpassed by the flavor of desire and love...","reviewBody":"'Revenge' has a recently retired fighter pilot (Kevin Costner) who goes to the coastal city of Puerto Vallarta, to enjoy the hospitality of an old friend he saves once his life on a hunting trip... 

The possessive longtime friend has a wonderful-but-unhappy wife... Mireya (Madeleine Stowe) is an exotic young brunette, with great magnetism, who truly blew Costner's mind... Mireya embarks on a passionate affair, that naturally drives her husband 'Tibby' (Anthony Quinn) out of his mind...

Sexual tension is an integral part of Tony Scott's character's conflict... It rises off like heat emanating from the sand when the two lovers head in a jeep toward a nearby cute cabin... Costner and Stowe are attracted to one another, and naturally, the more they fight the attraction, the more they are thrown together...

Stowe's body comes alive at that brief caress, quickening her pulse, making her breath catch in anticipation... She experiences the heat in the slow slide of Costner's fingers, a passionate demand she couldn't help but respond to...

The plot is really predictable, and there's real high tension in the first part, but multiple stabbings, shootings, and beatings in the second, as the husband enters a storm of insane fury against the lovers...

'Revenge' is certainly a realm of brutality and pain, of love gone wrong and vengeance gone mad...","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17192,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"duration":"PT2H4M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Tony Scott

Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0289765/","name":"Red Dragon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4MDgzNjM5MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjUwMzY2._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000146/","name":"Ralph Fiennes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0711840/","name":"Brett Ratner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0365383/","name":"Thomas Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0848217/","name":"Ted Tally"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Red Dragon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi848298265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk1ZWZmODktZGJjOS00ZGMyLWI3MzYtYmExZTRmMTJkM2UyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk1ZWZmODktZGJjOS00ZGMyLWI3MzYtYmExZTRmMTJkM2UyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "Coming Soon""},"datePublished":"2002-12-11","description":"A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.","keywords":"fbi agent,criminal profile,blindness,tabloid reporter,based on novel","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0289765/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Smells_Like_Cheese"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Better than "Hannibal", but not up with "Silence of the Lambs"","reviewBody":"But it was pretty damn close. "Red Dragon" was a great movie to watch. I have to admit that I had my doubts. I heard some bad things about this movie from my friends. I had bought the movie for my mom, and she said just to give it a shot. I'm glad I did. "Red Dragon" goes back into the roots that "Silence of the Lambs" did. It had high action and drama. I was very impressed. And Anthony Hopkins does a great job as his most famous role as Hannibal Lector. I really have to say that I didn't stick to my friend's opinions. This was a great movie. I would recommend for the "Silence of the Lambs" fans.\n\n9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":258708,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Killer Bees
Mordercze pszczoły
programme.desc:
Killer Bees: Directed by Penelope Buitenhuis. With C. Thomas Howell, Tracy Nelson, Fiona Loewi, Noel Fisher. After a truck accident causes their release, a small rural town is faced with a swarm of killer bees." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0353625/","name":"Killer Bees","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU5OTU2NzAtNTA5Ny00MTc3LTlkOGMtNjIxMzVmOTA0MTlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjIzMTQ5NjE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001367/","name":"C. Thomas Howell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0625796/","name":"Tracy Nelson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517370/","name":"Fiona Loewi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0119689/","name":"Penelope Buitenhuis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074385/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086887/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045895/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2091795/","name":"Dana Stone"}],"datePublished":"2002-11-19","description":"After a truck accident causes their release, a small rural town is faced with a swarm of killer bees.","keywords":"psychotronic film,creature feature,bee,killer bee,bee attack","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0353625/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Leofwine_draca"},"dateCreated":"2014-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Awful indeed","reviewBody":"My review of KILLER BEES!, a silly and no-budget TV movie from 2002, will go off on a tangent because of personal reasons. I found the tone of the script particularly offensive, particularly in the depiction of multiple sclerosis. I write as somebody married to an MS sufferer, and I can report that the MS portrayed in this film is even more ridiculous than the stuff involving the killer bees. The character doesn't act like somebody with MS in the slightest, the symptoms as described are wrong, and to top it all they describe MS as a 'terminal illness'. It's sloppy writing, and had me fuming.

Still, at least it enlivened what is otherwise an entirely forgettable movie. KILLER BEES! follows the same old hackneyed storyline with a single character (THE HITCHER'S C. Thomas Howell, looking old and tired) who recognises the impending threat while nobody else believes him. Inevitably, there's a big event coming up, and the greedy Mayor refuses to cancel it. What makes KILLER BEES! stand out is how poorly the action is staged, in addition to the terrible calibre of the special effects.

The PG rating is the final insult; if this had contained some proper gore effects a la PIRANHA 3D, I could have forgiven it for the rest of the problems. Instead, it plays it safe throughout, and the shots of bees are limited to just a few CGI clouds in the skies. It's nonsense and the cast of badly-acting townsfolk hardly serve to increase the entertainment value. In a world of bad films, KILLER BEES! is the worst bee B-movie yet.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":820,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3},"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

murder.","keywords":"new york,new york city,binge drinking,september 11 2001,year 1991","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1403981/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"apmassie"},"dateCreated":"2010-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Powerful","reviewBody":"I just saw this movie last night and wanted to take a few before saying anything on it. It is a very moving and powerful movie that shows the power of loss and love. All the main characters are seriously flawed and damaged people that because they come together (thanks to the angry Tyler) become better people and find their own reasons to truly live life (something none of them have done in years).

I thought the acting was very well done. Some i have heard complain about certain scenes but truthfully, if you have ever suffered any of the losses or pains that these people have, they would realize that the actions are spot on! 

I am wowed by the movie, stunned truly... I am also very glad that this movie was made, not as eye candy for Pattinson but rather to show his and others talent on such a touching, difficult, and painful subject. This would not have been made if it were not for the talent in this movie that pushed for it to be made, THANK YOU!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":140482,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: No Way Home
Bez powrotu
programme.desc:
No Way Home: Directed by Buddy Giovinazzo. With Tim Roth, James Russo, Deborah Kara Unger, Joseph Ragno. An ex-cons future is threatened by his brother's involvement with drugs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117194/","name":"No Way Home","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNTkwNTYyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzMyMjUyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000619/","name":"Tim Roth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000679/","name":"Deborah Kara Unger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0751638/","name":"James Russo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320546/","name":"Buddy Giovinazzo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017674/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0320546/","name":"Buddy Giovinazzo"}],"datePublished":"1997-05-23","description":"An ex-cons future is threatened by his brother's involvement with drugs.","keywords":"stripper,strip club,quickie,barroom brawl,independent film","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117194/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ElijahCSkuggs"},"dateCreated":"2008-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Did you say two kicks to the crotch?","reviewBody":"Let me just get this outta the way. *ahem* This movie has two scenes where someone gets kicked in the nuts. Two! For someone like myself, that's reason enough to check it out. But if you wanna know what it's about and blah blah blah, I suppose keep reading.

After spending some time in the cooler Joey is now released and is looking to get his life back on track. He ends up heading home, and reunites with his brother. Staying at his bro's until he finds steady work all seems fine, that is until he begins realizing the outside world is still as unforgiving and selfish as it was before.

No Way Home was a good flick. It had a lowkey and unpredictable Tim Roth running the show with a decently solid supporting cast bringing up the rear. At first the movie tends to feel like it's trying too hard (overacting), but it hits a pretty serious groove and it begins becoming a very solid flick. Most probably due to the increase in sex, adult-themed conversations and gritty violence.

With some surprising developments, some nice attention to realism, and a couple kicks in the groin, this should be a nice viewing for anyone who enjoys serious drama. Tim Roth being the lead doesn't hurt the flick much either.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1411,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

Two! For someone like myself, that's reason enough to check it out. But if you wanna know what it's about and blah blah blah, I suppose keep reading.

After spending some time in the cooler Joey is now released and is looking to get his life back on track. He ends up heading home, and reunites with his brother. Staying at his bro's until he finds steady work all seems fine, that is until he begins realizing the outside world is still as unforgiving and selfish as it was before.

No Way Home was a good flick. It had a lowkey and unpredictable Tim Roth running the show with a decently solid supporting cast bringing up the rear. At first the movie tends to feel like it's trying too hard (overacting), but it hits a pretty serious groove and it begins becoming a very solid flick. Most probably due to the increase in sex, adult-themed conversations and gritty violence.

With some surprising developments, some nice attention to realism, and a couple kicks in the groin, this should be a nice viewing for anyone who enjoys serious drama. Tim Roth being the lead doesn't hurt the flick much either.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1411,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"duration":"PT1H39M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Buddy Giovinazzo

programme.title: Moonlighting
Fucha
programme.desc: Moonlighting: Directed by Jerzy Skolimowski. With Jeremy Irons, Eugene Lipinski, Jirí Stanislav, Eugeniusz Haczkiewicz. A Polish contractor, Nowak, leads a group of workmen to London so they can provide cheap labor for a government official based there. Nowak (Irons) has to manage the project and the men as they encounter the tempations of the West and loneliness and separation from their families. Nowak is the only one of the group who speaks English, and he uses this as a tool over his team. When the unrest in Poland leads to a military takeover, Nowak is faced with a much more difficult situation than he expected." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0084354/","name":"Moonlighting","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Y0M2I3ZWItYTRjZi00YTAyLTliYWQtZGM3YzhiMDBmY2NiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTIyNzY1NzM@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000460/","name":"Jeremy Irons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0513468/","name":"Eugene Lipinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0822321/","name":"Jirí Stanislav"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0804592/","name":"Jerzy Skolimowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103461/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159436/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0804592/","name":"Jerzy Skolimowski"}],"description":"A Polish contractor, Nowak, leads a group of workmen to London so they can provide cheap labor for a government official based there. Nowak (Irons) has to manage the project and the men as they encounter the tempations of the West an","keywords":"british renaissance,immigrant,immigration,poland,solidarity","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0084354/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LauraLeeWasHere"},"dateCreated":"2015-10-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Peanut Gallery","reviewBody":"This film is a mesmerizing and strangely addictive story about a man who buys a dilapidated condo in London and hires and transports several Polish builders to London to renovate it because they will work for a cheaper amount than the unionized English workers. Except for the foreman (in an early role by Jeremy Irons) none of them speak English and the foreman doesn't tell his employer or his co- workers when they overshoot the budget and run out of money.\n\nTrying to figure out HOW he will get the job done and WHY he is going to such great lengths and pains becomes all consuming mental and emotional puzzles as you become sucked into this well written story and tour de force performance by Jeremy Irons. By the second half of the film, you can't bare to watch but can't stand to look away. (It's as if you meant to eat only a few peanuts to suddenly discover you've consumed the entire amount and didn't even notice) I think this film is best described as "Escapism" rather than "Enjoyment" but either way you won't be focused on anything else while you're watching it. In fact the "taste" of it lingered with me for days after I saw it. It's full of a quiet yet constantly building tension, with a capital 'T'. No car chases, big explosions, explicit sex, swearing or violence. Just a well constructed screen gem that seemed to have fallen through the cracks when it was released in the early 1980's.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2682,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

After the woman is involved in a drowning accident a few years later, she wakes up on-shore to find that she's living two days before her boyfriend's fatal fire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295172/","name":"Another Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwODQ3MDQwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTA3NzU4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001147/","name":"Shannen Doherty"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0242882/","name":"Max Martini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573037/","name":"Julian McMahon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718001/","name":"Jeffrey Reiner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020958/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016350/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1094769/","name":"Helen Frost"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104079/","name":"Don MacLeod"}],"datePublished":"2001-12-04","description":"A woman's boyfriend dies in a fire after a fight over the couple's unborn child. murder.","keywords":"new york,new york city,binge drinking,september 11 2001,year 1991","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1403981/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"apmassie"},"dateCreated":"2010-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Powerful","reviewBody":"I just saw this movie last night and wanted to take a few before saying anything on it. It is a very moving and powerful movie that shows the power of loss and love. All the main characters are seriously flawed and damaged people that because they come together (thanks to the angry Tyler) become better people and find their own reasons to truly live life (something none of them have done in years).

I thought the acting was very well done. Some i have heard complain about certain scenes but truthfully, if you have ever suffered any of the losses or pains that these people have, they would realize that the actions are spot on! 

I am wowed by the movie, stunned truly... I am also very glad that this movie was made, not as eye candy for Pattinson but rather to show his and others talent on such a touching, difficult, and painful subject. This would not have been made if it were not for the talent in this movie that pushed for it to be made, THANK YOU!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":140482,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Exorcist: The Beginning
Egzorcysta: Początek
programme.desc:
Exorcist: The Beginning: Directed by Renny Harlin. With Stellan Skarsgård, Izabella Scorupco, James D'Arcy, Remy Sweeney. Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0204313/","name":"Exorcist: The Beginning","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0NzY1MzQ0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTM1MTEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001745/","name":"Stellan Skarsgård"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001713/","name":"Izabella Scorupco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0195439/","name":"James D'Arcy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001317/","name":"Renny Harlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033472/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067503/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0527643/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0087861/","name":"William Peter Blatty"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0936537/","name":"William Wisher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139627/","name":"Caleb Carr"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exorcist: The Beginning","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3262429721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGNmNTMyZGMtNGI1My00OWRjLWE1ZGEtNDU5YmE1ZGFkYjBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGNmNTMyZGMtNGI1My00OWRjLWE1ZGEtNDU5YmE1ZGFkYjBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"datePublished":"2005-02-09","description":"Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.","keywords":"lucifer morningstar character,supernatural horror,psychotronic film,cgi animal in live action title,movie flop","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0204313/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"unbrokenmetal"},"dateCreated":"2006-06-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horror movie, but nothing more","reviewBody":"I watched Schrader's "Dominion" in the morning and Harlin's "Beginning" in the afternoon, hoping that watching them back to back would make a comparison easier than for most people who waited a year until the deleted version by Schrader was finally released. Renny Harlin used only a few minutes from the already existing footage, so "Beginning" really became a new movie. But unfortunately, the whole effort of re-shooting didn't make the movie better.

In Harlin's "remake", we get a smart young priest, straight from the Vatican (James D'Arcy) who has received all the information about the buried church in advance. In "Dominion", Gabriel Mann played an innocent priest who does not expect anything terrible, he just wants to start a school in the middle of Africa. The latter was the better screenplay idea in my opinion, because D'Arcy is such a cool "professional" that we don't really care about him, whereas Mann was a character the audience loves for his human feelings. Also there is more mystery in "Domionion" whereas "Beginning" once explained the whole background, and that was it - too easy.

"Beginning" has a lot more gory effects, swarms of ugly insects and its demon uses obscenities in same way Linda Blair did in the original "Exorcist" movie. This will probably entertain people who just want a horror movie and nothing else. Mind you, "Beginning" also has good photography, a few unforgettable moments like the battlefield at the beginning and good actors! But the release of the original version "Dominion" proved that the story has had more potential, Schrader worked more careful with the characters and their relationships and gave more food for thought. I voted 6/10 for "Beginning" and 8/10 for "Dominion"."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34124,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0204313, Title: Exorcist: The Beginning, --- Description: Exorcist: The Beginning: Directed by Renny Harlin. With Stellan Skarsgård, Izabella Scorupco, James D'Arcy, Remy Sweeney. Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0204313/","name":"Exorcist: The Beginning","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI0NzY1MzQ0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTM1MTEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001745/","name":"Stellan Skarsgård","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001713/","name":"Izabella Scorupco","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0195439/","name":"James D'Arcy"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001317/","name":"Renny Harlin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033472/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067503/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0527643/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0087861/","name":"William Peter Blatty","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0936537/","name":"William Wisher","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139627/","name":"Caleb Carr"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exorcist: The Beginning","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3262429721","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGNmNTMyZGMtNGI1My00OWRjLWE1ZGEtNDU5YmE1ZGFkYjBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGNmNTMyZGMtNGI1My00OWRjLWE1ZGEtNDU5YmE1ZGFkYjBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer","datePublished":"2005-02-09","description":"Years before Father Lankester Merrin helped save Regan MacNeil's soul, he first encounters the demon Pazuzu in East Africa. This is the tale of Father Merrin's initial battle with Pazuzu and the rediscovery of his faith.","keywords":"lucifer morningstar character,supernatural horror,psychotronic film,cgi animal in live action title,movie flop","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0204313/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"unbrokenmetal","dateCreated":"2006-06-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horror movie, but nothing more","reviewBody":"I watched Schrader's "Dominion" in the morning and Harlin's "Beginning" in the afternoon, hoping that watching them back to back would make a comparison easier than for most people who waited a year until the deleted version by Schrader was finally released. Renny Harlin used only a few minutes from the already existing footage, so "Beginning" really became a new movie. But unfortunately, the whole effort of re-shooting didn't make the movie better.

In Harlin's "remake", we get a smart young priest, straight from the Vatican (James D'Arcy) who has received all the information about the buried church in advance. In "Dominion", Gabriel Mann played an innocent priest who does not expect anything terrible, he just wants to start a school in the middle of Africa. The latter was the better screenplay idea in my opinion, because D'Arcy is such a cool "professional" that we don't really care about him, whereas Mann was a character the audience loves for his human feelings. Also there is more mystery in "Domionion" whereas "Beginning" once explained the whole background, and that was it - too easy.

"Beginning" has a lot more gory effects, swarms of ugly insects and its demon uses obscenities in same way Linda Blair did in the original "Exorcist" movie. This will probably entertain people who just want a horror movie and nothing else. Mind you, "Beginning" also has good photography, a few unforgettable moments like the battlefield at the beginning and good actors! But the release of the original version "Dominion" proved that the story has had more potential, Schrader worked more careful with the characters and their relationships and gave more food for thought. I voted 6/10 for "Beginning" and 8/10 for "Dominion".","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34124,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1,"duration":"PT1H54M"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Renny Harlin
